snippet.title: EndeavorRx® :30 Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing EndeavorRx, the first-and-only FDA-authorized video game treatment for ADHD.

The EndeavorRx app is a digital treatment indicated to improve attention function as measured by computer-based testing in children ages 8-12 years old with primarily inattentive or combined-type ADHD.  Patients who engage with EndeavorRx may not display benefits in typical behavioral symptoms, such as hyperactivity.  EndeavorRx should be considered as part of a therapeutic program and is not a substitute for ADHD medication.
The most common side effect observed in children in EndeavorRx’s clinical trial was a feeling of frustration, as the game can be quite challenging at times. No serious adverse events were observed with its use.
